author: collin.myersobolnetwork
content:
Hey Everyone - Was able to finally implement some much needed updates to the eth2 Calculator. Please let me know if anyone has any questions. Feel free to share across the community so we can get as many eyes on it as possible in preparation for Phase 0. Hope everyone is safe and healthy!

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15tmPOvOgi3wKxJw7KQJKoUe-uonbYR6HF7u83LR5Mj4/edit#gid=1548910165
